name: Speed Miner
description:
Speed Miner is a multiplayer arcade game in which you aim to extract as much ores as possible in 3 minutes. Defy your foe in a frenetic mining game, use your special abilities to steal resources from your opponent and become the richest miner ever !!

-- Controls--

Blue Miner

WASD for movement

U for mining

L for throwing dynamite

Red Miner

Directional arrows for movement

Insert for mining

Home for throwing dynamite

-- Outlander Games--

Game Design

- Pablo Martin de Hervas

- Mangel_RB

- Jose Miguel Garcia
